com.centurylink.mdw.services

Interface AssetServices

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssetServicesImpl

    public interface AssetServices
    Services for interacting with design-time workflow assets.

      • getAssetsOfType

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<AssetInfo>> getAssetsOfType(java.lang.String format)
                                                                   throws ServiceException
        Returns all assets for a given file extension (mapped to their package name). Assets do not contain VCS info.

        ServiceException
